item.title: How to take screenies and were to find (not on mopar)
item.dc:creator: @helpless helpless
item.description:
@helpless wrote:

[quote=“broke123, post:1, topic:112275”]well i need to take a screenie of a error i got while trying to download java so i need to now hw to take screenie and were to find[/quote]go to google and google Faststone Capturthen look for the download like and there ya go!take pics with tat,then save the pic,then post it sumwhere,then post url on forums! np for helping!
